root: ^Bob: Hi, welcome to Simmer! Are you ready to start cooking?

c-0: ^Bob: Great! First there are a few things you need to know.
^Bob: To move around use the WASD keys on your keyboard.
^Bob: You can right-click on objects around you to interact with them.
^Bob: Use the left mouse button to drag and drop food items and select them.
^Bob: You may access your recipe book by left-clicking on it. To see a recipe, simply drag and drop the finalized item from your inventory to the recipe book slot. A recipe diagram will appear.
^Bob: Here is what each connection means
^Bob: A YELLOW connection indicates that these items need to be put in the mixer.
^Bob: An ORANGE connection means the should go in the oven.
^Bob: And a WHITE connection means they need to be assebled on a plate.
^Bob: Now you're ready to start cookin'
